fig=plt.figure(figsize=(64, 64))
columns = 4
rows = 5
for index,image_id  in enumerate(trainimage_lst):
    img=Image.open("../input/train_images/"+image_id+".jpg")
    fig.add_subplot(rows, columns, index+1)

    plt.axis('off')
plt.show()
